mapper.sql: dictionary_id, dictionary_name, description, up_dictionary_id, in_use, english_name, data_type, remark
mapper.select: SELECT dic1.dictionary_id, dic1.dictionary_name, dic1.description, dic1.up_dictionary_id, dic1.in_use, dic1.english_name, dic1.data_type, dic1.remark, dic2.dictionary_name up_dictionary_name FROM t_base_sys_dic dic1 LEFT JOIN t_base_sys_dic dic2 ON dic1.up_dictionary_id = dic2.dictionary_id WHERE dic1.dictionary_id = #{dictionaryId}

SELECT dic1.dictionary_id, dic1.dictionary_name, dic1.description, dic1.up_dictionary_id, dic1.in_use, dic1.english_name, dic1.data_type, dic1.remark, dic2.dictionary_name up_dictionary_name FROM t_base_sys_dic dic1 LEFT JOIN t_base_sys_dic dic2 ON dic1.up_dictionary_id = dic2.dictionary_id WHERE dic1.up_dictionary_id=#{upDictionaryId} ORDER BY dic1.dictionary_id ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_base_sys_dic
dictionary_id,
dictionary_name,
description,
up_dictionary_id,
in_use,
english_name,
data_type,
remark,
#{dictionaryId},
#{dictionaryName},
#{description},
#{upDictionaryId},
#{inUse},
#{englishName},
#{dataType},
#{remark},
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_base_sys_dic
dictionary_name = #{dictionaryName},
description = #{description},
in_use = #{inUse},
english_name = #{englishName},
data_type = #{dataType},
remark = #{remark},
WHERE dictionary_id = #{dictionaryId}
